Gabrielle Giffords ( D-Ariz.), who is recovering from a gunshot wound to the head. Returned fr Houston today. Gabrielle Giffords continues to defy the odds& is so appreciative of all your support. Pls cont to keep her in your prayers, Kirsten Gillibrand posted on her Twitter account. Gabrielle Giffords was shot in the head at close range during a public event in Tucson, Ariz., on Jan. 8.
